title: Ice Breaker Sessions
shortDescription: Quick, high-energy games to warm up the room and get people talking.

children.text: Designed for the first 15–30 minutes of any event, these ice breakers help participants move past awkward introductions and into genuine conversations.

features: Customizable to group size and context
Perfect for kickstarting workshops and offsites

pricing.description: Ideal for single-session events up to 2 hours.

title: Problem-Solving Challenges
shortDescription: Timed team challenges that build collaboration, ownership, and creative thinking.

children.text: Teams compete and collaborate on structured tasks that mirror real workplace problem-solving — but in a playful, low-risk environment.

features: Debrief to connect games with work realities

pricing.description: Half-day engagement for up to 60 participants.

title: Outdoor Adventure Games
shortDescription: Active, trust-building games designed for open-air company retreats and offsites.

children.text: From trust walks to relay-style team missions, these games get people moving, laughing, and relying on each other.

features: Great for breaking monotony of classroom sessions

pricing.description: Full-day add-on for offsite team events.

title: Corporate Team Building
shortDescription: High-impact team-building modules for leadership and cross-functional teams.
features: Modules for leadership, new hires, and cross-functional groups
Hybrid of ice breakers, challenges, and reflection circles
Can be adapted to themes like trust, ownership, or innovation
deliverables: Custom agenda based on team goals

title: College Fest Engagement
shortDescription: High-energy activities, crowd games, and hosting for college festivals.
features: Custom segments for sponsors and college clubs

title: Community Programs
shortDescription: Light-hearted, inclusive activities for communities, NGOs, and social groups.
deliverables: Games tailored for mixed age groups
